description: This file contains internal functions and data structures for managing a Security object within COSA Data Model. It includes creation, initialization, removal, and registration of security policies, accessing external files, and managing internal lists of policies, URLs, keywords, and apps.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_SECURITY
classes.description: Structure representing the Security object in the COSA data model, holding configurations, lists of policies, and associated metadata.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaSecurityCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new Security object, returning its handle.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaSecurityInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Security object, loads configurations and policies, and sets up internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaSecurityRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes and frees the Security object, cleaning up all internal resources and linked lists.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaSecurityIARegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves registered Internet Access policies from persistent storage and populates the internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaSecurityIARegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Adds or updates Internet Access policy information in the persistent storage and internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaSecurityIARegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Deletes Internet Access policy information from persistent storage and internal data structures.

ctags.name: CosaSecurityIARegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
